version_description:
News for version 1.0.2
- Bug fixes and improvements

We have brought THE UPDATE that you and your friends, fans of Dominoes, have been waiting for: now you can set up tables and play with your friends in the new Turbo mode! In this mode, there is only one round, and the player with the highest score wins. You can look on your Facebook friends list to see who is online and set up a table there and then, or send a message to an offline friend to join the game.

Invite your friends now to play and enjoy yourselves with Dominoes!

What do you think? Let us know at domino.iphone@gazeus.com
If you liked this update, rate the app Dominoes! Have a good game!

We have brought THE UPDATE that you and your friends, fans of Dominoes, have been waiting for: now you can set up tables and play with your friends in the new Turbo mode! In this mode, there is only one round, and the player with the highest score wins. You can look on your Facebook friends list to see who is online and set up a table there and then, or send a message to an offline friend to join the game.

Invite your friends now to play and enjoy yourselves with Dominoes!

In addition:
- Improvements to the app’s performance.
- and bug fixes.

What do you think? Let us know at domino.iphone@gazeus.com
If you liked this update, rate the app Dominoes! Have a good game!

Attention, attention! Look what we have here: The User Profile! Get ready because now you will be able to see your wins and losses!

And to get our place neat and clean, we exterminated bugs and tidied up the house. Improvements always welcome!
Did you like it? Yeah? Leave your love and affection in your review! It's important to us, and we love a sky full of 5-stars!

In this version of the game Dominoes jogatina - Classic Board Game:

* Improvements to the app’s performance.
* and bug fixes.

Please rate Dominoes after every update! Your comments will help us guarantee the best gaming experience possible! Send us now any questions, suggestions or critics to: domino.iphone@gazeus.com.

Look what we have here! You asked for it and we just brought some cool news in this update!

- A brand new layout for the game!

- Display of the pieces at the end of the game

- Count of pieces in stock and also ...

- Count of pieces in the player's hand!

Seriously, best update ever! :)

Upgrade now! And do not forget to evaluate our game, review your note, send your message and suggestions. They help us a lot to do an even better game!

Want to talk with us? Send us an email to domino.iphone@gazeus.com

We read everything, everything! We really do. :)

In this version of the game Dominoes jogatina - Classic Board Game:

* and bug fixes.

Please rate Dominoes after every update! Your comments will help us guarantee the best gaming experience possible! Send us now any questions, suggestions or critics to: domino.iphone@gazeus.com.

And here it comes! Huzzah, update time!

- Now we have an easy and more visible way to show you where the tile will be placed. That´s good! Much obliged for the feedback!

- And to wrap things around here, a nicer way to show you the end round and, as usual, we fixed a few bugs.

Upgrade now! And do not forget to evaluate our game, review your note, send your message and suggestions. They help us a lot to do an even better game!

Want to talk to us? Send us an email to domino.iphone@gazeus.com

We love when you give us some feedback.

Psst! Hey, hi! Do you know what is coming in this update? Have you ever wondered how cool it would be to talk to the people you play with? Without this message ready thing, a real chat!

That's right! Chat enabled! Now you can actually chat with other players! Be nice be cool and make some friends! This update and you too, deserve 5 stars!

And to make everything clean, we tidy up the house, and now wait for friends for a good chat!

Dominoes Jogatina was downloaded by more than 1000000 people and now they will have the opportunity to become a VIP member with the subscription of the game and remove all ads!

You still can play for free or play without the ads! What are you waiting for?

Dominoes Jogatina was downloaded by more than 1000000 people and now some great news: you can connect and play with your Apple Sign In!

What are you waiting for?! Come play and have fun.

PLAYING WITH FRIENDS just got better with these super new features:

- Matches between 2 players.

- All the incredible game modes: Turbo, Draw, Block, and All Fives.

- Share the link on Whatsapp, Messenger, etc and create a match with your friends.

What are you waiting for? Have fun with Dominoes Jogatina. Play now!
